com.futurice.cascade.reactive.ui

Class ReactiveEditText

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.TextView
        • android.widget.EditText
          • com.futurice.cascade.reactive.ui.ReactiveEditText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnPreDrawListener, INamed

    public class ReactiveEditText
extends android.widget.EditText
implements INamed
    An EditText which can be manipulated and which in turn manipulates a supporting ReactiveValue which reflects the current on-screen value

    FIXME The cursor position on screen is not maintained nicely when values update

    Created by Paul Houghton on 12-03-2015.
